description: A test script using pytest for testing the SlidevTemplate implementation within the universalinit project. It includes fixtures for setting up mock template directories and configuration, and tests for initializing projects, loading configs, variable replacements in templates, registration of templates, and post-processing execution.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs, cleans up after test.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and sample files for testing.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a mock project configuration for testing purposes.

methods.name: test_slidev_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the template provides correct initialization info including environment setup commands.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests initialization of a project, verifying files are created and contents are correctly processed.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that post-processing scripts are executed and completed successfully.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures template variables are correctly replaced with project configuration values in output files.

methods.name: test_slidev_registration()
methods.description: Ensures the Slidev template is properly registered in the factory and can be instantiated.

methods.name: test_slidev_validation()
methods.description: Checks that the validate_parameters method for SlidevTemplate correctly validates parameters.
